Message.Title: ebay over $ 80 in five years
Message.Msg: This growth rate should allow the current stock price of $45 to increase to over $80 in five years.

Message.Title: Ebay Exposure & FVF Fee's
Message.Msg: List in Ebay motors pay 10% FVF List on Ebay and pay 11% FVF People signed into Ebay motors do NOT see Ebay ads! People signed into Ebay DO see Ebay Motor ads So it's better to list in Ebay Motors and it's cheaper. . . ~NEWS YOU CAN USE~

A+ for effort in trying to bring back the intelligent discourse all by yourself but you can see clearly see this board isd futile, and this year's election "choice" is a crual joke on the American people, the world, and the planet. We can choose between giving Wall St, the banks and the rich everything they want while we wonder what Michelle is wearing today, or giving Wall St, the banks and the rich everything they want while we wonder about dressage horses and elevators for automobiles in huge mansions. Either way we get drones everywhere killing people. Even killing American citizens is "legal" now and the drones are in the US. Of course, everthing Hitler ever did was legal at the time. Never makes it right. Romney supporters are lukewarm sitting on the fence, except for the record breaking donors, while Obama's past fans still wait for their hope and change. Anyways, keep up the good work and at least trying out there.

One of my students recently did their term paper on paid stock pumpers, those who receive money to make outlandish claims to mislead investors, and I was amazed at how little they are actually paid, and how so few of them even invest in the stock they are touting. It seems they know information kept from the average investor.
Back to the top. Let's see if the suckers can maintain silence, and their pumped out $45, or blabber their hate and see $40 again. My vote is cast. Enjoy!
